group_1.textCenter: Starting from today, we won't be going for@any walks for a while.
Sorry for making you go along with an@old couple's weird little joke.

group_1.textLeft: | As time goes by, all things will eventually@come to an end... |
| Have you seen it, Senior-senpai...? The@moment when something comes to an end... |
| Those footsteps... |

group_1.textRight: *Pant*...*Pant*...*Pant*...
Ahh, you're also here today.

group_1.textLeft: | The one Asuka teaches... You're jogging@again? |

group_1.textRight: Yeah, but it's almost time for this to end.

group_1.textLeft: | .........[wait:1.0][chara:304301:cheek_0][chara:304301:lipSynch_1]End? |

group_1.textRight: That's right, my father is being transferred for@his job and we're moving away.
I feel sorry towards Asuka, but I can only go@to the Ryushinkan Dojo for a few more days.

group_1.textLeft: | Is that so... |

group_1.textRight: But my biggest regret is that I won't be able@to see this sakura tree.
It was my spiritual support.

group_1.textLeft: | You could always come back to see it again. |

group_1.textRight: I know...
But it's pretty far away, so I wonder when@the next opportunity will be...
I would have liked to stay until it was in full@bloom this year.

group_1.textCenter: | For some reason, I feel a pain in my chest. |

group_1.textLeft: | Grandfather and Grandmother couldn't keep@coming until the cherry blossoms bloom... |
| Nor the one Asuka teaches... |
| Are you lonely, Senior-senpai? |

group_1.textRight: Hey, you there! The highschool girl!@What are you doing out at this hour?!
It's not good, you know. Staying out at night is@the first step towards delinquency, you know?
*Hic*

group_1.textLeft: | A drunk... |

group_1.textRight: I'm an adult, you know. It's fine for adults to@get drunk, you know?

group_1.textLeft: | I wouldn't know. I can't get drunk. |

group_1.textRight: Of course not, you're in high school!@[chara:801000:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:801000:cheek_2][chara:801000:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:801000:lipSynch_1]...*Sigh* I need a break..!
Whew...the night breeze feels nice...

group_1.textLeft: | Do you come here often...? |

group_1.textRight: I've been stressed out since I've been@reassigned to a new place, you know.
So I come here to drink alone. That's how@I heal, you know.

group_1.textLeft: | So you're saying that you're stressed today? |

group_1.textRight: Well, yeah, you know.
So go home already!

group_1.textLeft: | No, I need some more time. |

group_1.textRight: ...Well, you don't leave me much choice,@you know.
I'll just have to give you permission in@exchange for listening to me complain.

group_1.textLeft: | All right. |

group_1.textRight: But yeah, being stressed out is inevitable.
I have to transfer out of the school I finally@got used to, you know...
I was really pumped up and working hard,@but now I feel drained...

group_1.textLeft: | I don't like school, but I enjoy being with@my friends. |

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that's important too, you know!@It's good to make friends!
That's why I worked so hard for that girl...
I heard she was going to school for the first@time after being hospitalized for so long...

group_1.textLeft: | Oh. |
| Are you talking about Ui? |

group_1.textRight: [chara:801000:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]You know Ui?! You know, are you her sister?!
No, wait, your uniform is different.

group_1.textLeft: | Ui is a very important person to me. |

group_1.textRight: Very clear and simple!
But if you know her, well, you know...
Please keep it a secret that I'm leaving the@school.

group_1.textLeft: | Why? |

group_1.textRight: I haven't told her yet, and she adores me@so much.
I don't want to give her a shock until the@last minute, you know...
I'll have to say goodbye...

group_1.textLeft: | Will you be here until...the cherry blossoms@bloom? |

group_1.textRight: No, I'll be gone by then, you know.

group_1.textCenter: | If the cherry blossoms bloom...or, when the@time comes for them to bloom... |
| Ui's favorite teacher will also be gone... |

group_1.narration: | When the cherry blossoms bloom...@Grandfather, Grandmother,@Asuka's student, and Ui's teacher@will all be gone... |
